title: Design Matters from the Archive: Nico Muhly
description: Debbie talks to composer Nico Muhly about his music and about the musicians who interpret it. "I always feel like they appreciate something that’s detailed on the page to indicate that I know what I’m talking about, but with room for them to continue the conversation when I’m dead."
itunes:subtitle: Debbie talks to composer Nico Muhly about his music and about the musicians who  interpret it. "I always feel like they appreciate something that’s  detailed on the page to indicate that I know what I’m talking about, but  with room for them to continue the conversation when I’m dead."
author: podcasts@ted.com (Design Matters Media)
itunes:author: Debbie Millman
